K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-13: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-18: chos bstan pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-19: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-20: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi snod de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-21: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-22: ma skyes dgra yi bu mor gyur pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-23: mya ngan med byin yon tan gzi brjid brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-24: nyan thos lnga brgya dag ni lhags gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-25: de la phyag bya'i phyir ni de ma lang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-26: ma skyes dgra yis de la smras pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392a-27: bu mo don 'di nga las nyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-0: khyod kyi nyan thos lnga @392b brgya mthong bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-1: phyag bya'i phyir ni ci phyir ldang mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-2: bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin na re //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-3: nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-4: ci phyir phyag 'tshal bsam pa mi skye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-5: bdag mchis yab gcig tshig ni gsan par gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-6: dper na mi zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-7: rin chen 'byung khungs nas ni mching bu blangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-8: de bzhin bdag ni nyan thos thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-9: ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-10: dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang du phyug po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-11: sa bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-12: kar sha ba ni gcig tsam gsol na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-13: de yis rgyal po bsten pa don ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-14: gang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-15: bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-16: des ni dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-17: des ni rgyal po legs par bsten pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-18: kar sha pa ni slong ba'i mi bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-19: gang zhig sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-20: thos nas theg pa dman la 'dod skyed pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-22: nor rnams sgrub bgyid mi ni ji lta bu //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-25: byang chub re gnas sems can 'dul bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:392b-26: dper na nad pa nad brgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-4: sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-5: de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-6: sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-7: ji ltar nad pa sos par gyur ba thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-8: sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-9: de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par 'gyur ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-10: sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-11: 'di ni sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-12: gso bar sems kyi sems can gzhan la ma lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-13: de 'dra'i bdag nyid khengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-14: sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-15: sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyid ji lta bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-16: de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad las grol bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-17: de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-18: 'jig rten kun gyis 'dud bar bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-19: gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393a-20: bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-0: de ni sman pa bdag @393b nyid grol bar bgyid pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-1: mkhas pa dag gis mchod pa bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-2: gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-3: sems can grangs med sdug bsngal dag las grol bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-4: de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun ba skyed pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-5: de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-6: ae randa yi shing sdong mdzes pa ma lags la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-7: de dag rnams kyi grib ma'ang yangs pa ma lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-8: ae randa yi shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-9: rnam par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar bsten ma lags //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-12: de bzhin bdag ni byung chub sems dpa' rnams la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-13: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gis don bgyid snyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-14: ba lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-15: tsha bas gdungs ba zhi bar mi bgyid la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-16: gangg'a'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-17: tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-18: ba lang rmig rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-19: sems can kun gyi tsha bzhi mi bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-20: gangg'a'i klung 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-21: ji ltar rin chen char ni 'bab pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:393b-22: dbul po dag ni 'gron bu len par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-0: gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas @394a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-2: sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-4: nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-6: sems can don slad mang du len par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-7: ji ltar sems can dag ni ri rab kyi //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-17: rab tu khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'di //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-19: nyan thos thams cad zil ba'i thigs pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rab 'bebs sprin dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-21: snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-22: stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-23: ka ra bi ra'i me tog dri mchog mi na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-24: des ni skyes par bud med dga' ma 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-25: tsam ba ka yi me tog dri la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394a-26: autpal bar shi ka yang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-0: nyan thos ka ra @394b pi ra'i dri bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-1: de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-2: kun mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-3: lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-4: gcig pu mchi ba de la mtshar ci mchis //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-16: nyan thos gzings las brten pa lta bu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-17: sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-18: rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur zhugs byang chub sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-19: sdug bsngal mtsho las sems can sgrol bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-20: ji ltar g-yul ngor bong bu zhon na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-21: dgra las rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-22: glang chen rta dang shing rta zhon nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-23: g-yul du lhags ba'i dgra rnams choms par nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-24: nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-25: byang chub sems dpa' glang chen zhon 'dra ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:394b-26: sems can kun la phan dang bde slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-1: shing dbang drung du bdud rnams 'joms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-2: ji ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-3: de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-4: zla ba rab tu rgyas pa shar bas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-5: mtshan mo mkha' la thig le bzhin du mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-6: yab gcig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-7: rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-8: gang dag sems can kun la sman slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-9: ye shes shar bas skye bo snang bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-10: yab gcig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-12: 'dzam gling 'di na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-14: nyan thos 'di dag srin bu me khyer 'dra //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-16: sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu yi //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-18: yab gcig wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-20: sengge'i skad kyis glang chen ri dvags dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395a-26: yab gcig rgyu 'di bdag gis mthong bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-0: theg pa @395b dman pa dag la 'dod mi skyed //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-2: theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-3: gang dag byang chub dam pa yongs spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-4: theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-5: de dag 'tsho ngan rnyed pa thob ma 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-6: de dag mir skyes ba ni nyes par mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-7: gang dag lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-8: byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-9: de dag legs 'tsho rnyed par legs par rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-10: de dag mi lus thob pa legs par mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-11: gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-12: 'jig rten sman slad las bgyid yid kyang rton //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-13: gang dag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-14: de dag au dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-15: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-18: kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-20: ma thob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par byar nges so snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-21: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-22: bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:395b-23: ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:396a-2: bu mo khyod ci zhig don du gnyer na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:396a-3: 'di ltar sengge'i sgra sgrogs par byed /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-8: 'di ltar btsun pa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma gsungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-9: ri dvags kyi rgyal po sengge ral pa can cod pa na btags pa lta bus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-10: bu wa bskyed par 'gyur ba nam yang gsan tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-17: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal lta bus gshegs pa; dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba zhabs 'bring ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-18: nyan thos mdzes pa ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas gang smra na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-21: byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin no zhes de dag la yang dag pa'i smra bas smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-23: de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal bas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-24: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:406b-25: gtam 'di brjod pa'i skabs su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-2: lha'i bu brgya tham pas kyang bu mo de'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-4: tshig 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-6: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sras su khas len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-8: lha'i bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu mo bya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-9: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-10: de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa khri gser gyi rkang pa can las babs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-11: nyan thos chen po de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-16: myang bar bya ba bsod pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-18: gus pas rang gi lag nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-21: rang dgar slang dro bcom ldan la chos nyan du bzhud cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-25: de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407a-26: pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-0: skye bo phal ches yongs su bskor @407b nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-1: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-3: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-4: nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-8: bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-11: bu mo 'dis ni thog ma nyid du byang chub don du gnyer ba na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-12: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-15: ci'i slad du bu mo 'dis bud med kyis lus ma bsgyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-19: bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med do snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-20: byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:407b-21: smon lam gyis bdag nyid bud med kyi gzugs su ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-0: de nas de'i tshe bu mo mya ngan med @408a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-1: kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-2: bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs gang gis chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-3: bud med kyang ma yin pa lta na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-4: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-5: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang mthong bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-6: tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-7: bud med kyi mtshan ma mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa'i mtshan ma byung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-8: steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa steng gi bar snang la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408a-18: tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyar yang 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-0: dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa @408b bcur gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-1: de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-2: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-3: ;'jig rten gyi khams de yang bee d'urya las grub pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-4: rin po che sna bdun gyis bkra bar byas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-5: mig mang ris su bris la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-6: rin po che'i padmas khebs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-7: ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-8: lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod dag kyang khyad par med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-10: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-11: longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi yang der de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-13: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo dam pa zla ba can zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-14: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-16: bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di dgung zla dgur rum na bzung ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-17: bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-19: bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:408b-20: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od de nyid du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-0: 'di'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par @409a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-4: sring mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-10: rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-11: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-12: lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-13: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe rgyal po dung zhes bya ba de'i bu rgyal po gzhon nu mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-15: des de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i ngam [*dam] pa'i chos thog ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-17: tha ma'i bar du 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-18: bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-19: de mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pas byang chub thob pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-20: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409a-21: des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa dag byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-0: @409b sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-2: de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can gyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-3: tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-4: bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te; tshangs par spyod pa rgyal pos gnang nas bslab pa'i gzhi dag bzung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-6: lhas phul ba'i me tog manda ra ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor thams cad la gtor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-7: de nas bar snang las babs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-8: tshig 'di skad du bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gis byang chub thob pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad brdzus te skyes shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-10: chos gos ngur smrig gyon la rin po che'i padma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ba lta na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:409b-12: dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gnas par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas ma thag tu dge slong gi spyod @410a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-1: lam dang ldan par snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas pa rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-4: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni bcos ma ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-5: rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-6: yongs su brtags pa las langs pa med bzhin du phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-7: rgyal po chen po gzigs shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-8: de ring kho na'i gdugs gcig la bu mo'i gzugs su yang gzigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-9: khye'u yi gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-10: da ni bdag la dge slong gi gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-11: 'di la gang yang dag pa'i gzugs lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-13: de ltar na ya ma rla'i chos thams cad la 'di na kha cig lta ba'i kun nas dkris pas kun nas glags shing mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-14: rang gi rgyud la mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis yongs su bsreg go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-15: yongs su bsregs pas chos 'dul ba 'di ma 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-16: 'gyod pa ma lags pa la 'gyod par sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410a-18: de ltar na khyod kyis bag yod par mdzod la rgyal srid nyam nga ba na bzhugs bzhin du rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du bzhud cig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-0: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khyod kyi yod @410b pa ma yin pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i 'gyod pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-1: rgyal po chen po khyod ni bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang ba lags kyi bzhud cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-2: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-3: btsun mo zla ba can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-4: btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-5: byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-6: dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-9: bdag cag ni bgyi ba mang zhing bgyid pa mang ba lags kyi bdag cag mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-12: da de'i dus bab par shes na song zhig ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-13: rgyal po ma skyes dgra btsun mo zla ba can la sogs pa btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-15: kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-19: gzhan dag yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-22: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:410b-23: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-4: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i sengge'i sgra zhes bya ba dang; mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-5: gzhan dag la yang ston cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-7: gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-8: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na rna lam du thos na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-10: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-13: brjod pa'i lung ji skad phog pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrub pa lta ci smos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-16: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-20: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-22: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-23: 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411a-24: 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411b-0: @411b rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-014:411b-2: lo tstsha ba zhang ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa //
